definition[0]: a list of goods that have been supplied or work that has been done, showing how much you owe for them
definition[2]: a document sent by a seller to a customer with details of goods or services that have been provided, their price, and the payment date
example[0]: We require suppliers to submit invoices with services clearly categorized.
definition[3]: to prepare and send an invoice or to arrange for one to be prepared and sent
example[1]: An invoice raised in April related to the first stage of the contract payment.
definition[4]: to try to persuade someone to pay an unpaid invoice
example[2]: On completion of a job I give a report to the client, raise invoices and if necessary chase them up.
